newsitem.title: UK: Britain's Southern Electric seeks brand-name link.
newsitem.headline: Britain's Southern Electric seeks brand-name link.

text.p: Southern Electric Plc , one of Britain's two surviving independent regional electricity companies (Recs), wants to tackle liberalisation of the market in 1998 by linking up with one or more national brand names, company officials said.
"Southern is not a known brand in the north of England, where, for example, a supermarket or petrol company might be," Ralph Earwicker, director of corporate relations, told Reuters in an interview.
